ref.target: SB’s assistant; see SB’s Memoir Shakespeare & Co. p.214-15. Note 1943 Card uses init. FB

person.note: Bryher is Pseudonym for Anne Winifred Ellerman

note.p: Different from Thomas Edwards, I think

persName.forename: Madame {wife of Senator Jules Emile Jeanneney}

persName.surname: Open {probable misspelling of Oppen entry below}

persName.forename: Maimie {Daughter of Chinese Ambassador at Washington}
